TopicTitle: Graphical glitch on the stage display? (Version 1.12.2)

Articles.Content:
Why, after I arm my chutes, do large spaces appear between the chute icons?

(This is a sandbox test of a 10 seat reusable Mun lander, for career mode tourists.)

I don't know about your specific case, but as a general rule I found that the staging graphic display is prone to all sorts of glitches when the ship starts to get a bit of complexity.

it doesn't affect the game, so you can ignore it and keep playing.
The staging list is spacing the visible icons as if you've expanded all the groups of parachutes so they're all shown individually in the list. It's a harmless visual anomaly, is all.
